lead_paragraph: Indiana State fired Coach Lou West and rehired as the interim coach the man who led the Sycamores to their last winning season more than a decade ago. West, a former defensive coordinator at Toledo, was 1-25 since taking over the Sycamores in 2005. Dennis Raetz, who won 94 games in 18 years with the Sycamores, will return to the team while the university conducts a search for a new coach.
